name: VR Pig Dissection: Hoggin' the Scalpel
name_original: VR Pig Dissection: Hoggin' the Scalpel
description: VictoryXR’s virtual reality pig dissection software is a hands-on dissection opportunity experienced through the power of VR. This true-to-life practice thoroughly covers each step of the science procedure that students would take if dissecting a fetal pig specimen in their classroom. Guiding learners through each anatomical system, a digitized version of a licensed science teacher appears as a hologram, providing guidance to users throughout the entire experience. Learning can take place anytime and anywhere.
